channel.title: Projects on Noah Peeters
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Noah Peeters

item.title: Wobbly Tower
item.description: Wobbly Tower logo Wobbly Tower was my first iOS game project on the AppStore. The goal of the game is to stack tetrominos and build a tower.

item.title: PyMathExpressions
item.description: During the time I experimented with python, I created a package to work with math expressions I – creatively – called PyMathExpressions. It is the only python package I’ve ever published. At that time, I didn’t know anything about parsers or how to create them. So this project was a fun way to expore them. An important disclaimer: I wouldn’t recommend using this package in a projects.
